tr_quotes.quote: Zaman bir insanın harcayabileceği en değerli şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Theophrastus

tr_quotes.quote: Düşünceniz hareketinizi belirler ve hareketiniz sonuçlarınızı belirler. Ama unutmayın, öncelikle inanmalısınız.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

tr_quotes.quote: Sahip olmadıklarına yoğunlaşırsan asla yeterince sahip olamazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

tr_quotes.quote: Paraya sahip olmanın tek güzel yanı onu harcamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Uçurtmalar rüzgar gücüyle değil, o güce karşı koydukları için yükselir.
tr_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

tr_quotes.quote: Her zaman, ne kadar yol alacağınıza değil, ne kadar yol aldığınıza odaklanın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı adamı olmaya değil, değer adamı olmaya çalış.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Hatalar keşfin giriş kapılarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: James Joyce

tr_quotes.quote: Yoğun bir hayatın kısırlığından kaçınınız.
tr_quotes.author: Socrates

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı için, hayatı ve getirdiklerini koşulsuz kabul etmek haricinde, kesinlikle hiçbir formül yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

tr_quotes.quote: Doğru yönde birçok defa küçük adım atmak, geriye doğru tökezletecek öne büyük bir sıçrama yapmaktan daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı, asla gelecekte atacağınız büyük bir adım değil, şimdi atacağınız küçük bir adımdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jonatan Mårtensson

tr_quotes.quote: Evet deme gücü olmayan insanın size hayır demesine asla izin vermeyin .
tr_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

tr_quotes.quote: Eleştiri, hiç bir şey söylemeyerek, hiç bir şey yapmayarak ve hiçbir şey olmayarak kolayca kurtulabileceğiniz bir şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristotle

tr_quotes.quote: Zenginliğin gerçek ölçüsü, tüm paranızı kaybettiğinizde ne kadar edeceğinizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şevk, dünyadaki en önemli servettir. Parayı, gücü ve nüfuzu yener.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Chester

tr_quotes.quote: Sürekli çaba – kuvvet veya zeka değil – potansiyelimizin kilidini açan anahtardır.
tr_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

tr_quotes.quote: Uzun vadede risk verme isteğimizden daha fazlasını almayacağız.
tr_quotes.author: Sheldon Kopp

tr_quotes.quote: Göze göz, sadece bütün dünyayı kör yaparak sonuçlanır.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı, olmanız gerektiğine inandığınız kişi olmak için cesaret, azim ve irade sahibi olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: George Sheehan

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey yapmamak, hiçbir şey yapmamakla meşgul olmaktan daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal kırıklıklarıyla değil, sunduğu olasılıklarıyla hayatı ölçen ruh yüceliğini elde etmek için uğraşın.
tr_quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

tr_quotes.quote: Aldığınızla geçinirsiniz; verdiğinizle bir yaşamınız olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Az kahkahanın olduğu yerde az başarı vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

tr_quotes.quote: Neredeyse her şey, hiçbir şeyden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Henri F. Amiel

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğimin en iyisini yaptım: insanların ihtiyacı olan tüm felsefe budur.
tr_quotes.author: Lin-yutang

tr_quotes.quote: Rahatlamayı ve cevabı beklemeyi öğrenirseniz aklınız birçok soruyu cevaplayacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimizin problemleri var. Onları çözdüğümüz yol bizi farklı yapandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevinç, potansiyelinizi kullanarak gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Will Schultz

tr_quotes.quote: Dostta zenginseniz, hiçbir şeyde fakir değilsinizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Lilian Whiting

tr_quotes.quote: Yukarıya çıkarken insanlara iyi davran çünkü aşağıya inerken onlarla karşılaşacaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeyin yapılamayacağını söyleyenler, yapan diğerlerini engellememelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Mükemmeliyete diğerlerinden daha fazla umursayarak, daha fazla risk alarak, daha fazla hayal kurarak, daha çok umarak ulaşılabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni bir şeyler denemekten sakınacağınız kadar başarısızlıktan korkmayın. Hayatın en üzücü özeti üç tanımdan oluşur: yapabilirdim, yapsam iyi olurdu, yapmalıydım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın zorlukları seni felce uğratmak için değil, senin kim olduğunu keşfetmene yardım etmek içindir.
tr_quotes.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

tr_quotes.quote: Özen ve çaba şans getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı karakteri inşa eder. Başarısızlık onu açığa çıkarır.
tr_quotes.author: Dave Checketts

tr_quotes.quote: Küçük başlangıçlardan büyük şeyler doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Kazanma isteğinden daha güçlü olanı başlama cesaretidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün başlanmamış bir şey asla yarın bitirilemez.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Zorluk karşısında kararlılık, karakteri üretir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Makul olanı yapabilir ya da mümkün olana karar verebilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bugünün hayal kırıklıklarının yarının hayallerini gölgelemesine izin vermeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seni engelleyen şey kim olduğun değil, kim olmadığını düşünmendir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Neysen o ol. Bu olduğundan daha iyi olmanın ilk adımıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Julius Charles Hare

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı kolay elde edilir, zor olan başarıyı hak etmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı mutluluğun anahtarı değildir. Mutluluk başarının anahtarıdır. Yaptığınız işi severseniz başarılı olursunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyden önce, hazırlık başarının anahtarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

tr_quotes.quote: Başarının sırrı, amaca sadakattır.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamda başarının sırrı, fırsat çıktığında ona hazır olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Success - keeping your mind awake and your desire asleep
en_quotes.author: Walter Scott

en_quotes.quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success
en_quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

en_quotes.quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble
en_quotes.author: Shah Rukh Khan

en_quotes.quote: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: With the success of a show, you get an opportunity to call attention to things that you believe in
en_quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

en_quotes.quote: Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace
en_quotes.author: Mike Ditka

en_quotes.quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen
en_quotes.author: Wayne Huizenga

en_quotes.quote: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed
en_quotes.author: Godfrey Winn

en_quotes.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: You were designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents
en_quotes.author: Jane D. Hull

en_quotes.quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability
en_quotes.author: Walter Scott

en_quotes.quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance
en_quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

en_quotes.quote: The level of our success is limited only by our imagination and no act of kindness, however small, is ever wasted
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: Just remember, you can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success
en_quotes.author: Shiv Khera

en_quotes.quote: There is no success you can celebrate more than the success of a brother
en_quotes.author: Diego Luna

en_quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure
en_quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something
en_quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

en_quotes.quote: For me, money is not my definition of success. Inspiring people is a definition of success
en_quotes.author: Kanye West

en_quotes.quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success
en_quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

en_quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Communication - the human connection - is the key to personal and career success
en_quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Find something you're passionate about and keep tremendously interested in it
en_quotes.author: Julia Child

en_quotes.quote: The road to success is always under construction
en_quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

en_quotes.quote: I firmly believe that unless one has tasted the bitter pill of failure, one cannot aspire enough for success
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Personal satisfaction is the most important ingredient of success
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable
en_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

en_quotes.quote: Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe
en_quotes.author: Sumner Redstone

en_quotes.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success
en_quotes.author: James Cameron

en_quotes.quote: Personality is the most important thing to an actress's success
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: The key to success is action, and the essential in action is perseverance
en_quotes.author: Sun Yat-sen

en_quotes.quote: If you wish to be a success in the world, promise everything, deliver nothing
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: We must see others' struggles as our own, and their success as our success, so we can speak to our common humanity
en_quotes.author: Ilhan Omar

en_quotes.quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in
en_quotes.author: Bill Bradley

en_quotes.quote: When you've learned to love yourself, you get all the things that come with that. Friends, passion, success
en_quotes.author: Christen Press

en_quotes.quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success
en_quotes.author: Bear Bryant

en_quotes.quote: The limits of our success are just the limits of our energy
en_quotes.author: Katya Zamolodchikova

en_quotes.quote: Success is due to our stretching to the challenges of life. Failure comes when we shrink from them
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: All those who are around me are the bridge to my success, so they are all important
en_quotes.author: Manny Pacquiao

en_quotes.quote: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities
en_quotes.author: Walter Scott

en_quotes.quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
en_quotes.author: Doug Larson

en_quotes.quote: Every skill you acquire doubles your odds of success
en_quotes.author: Scott Adams

en_quotes.quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet
en_quotes.author: Bobby Unser

en_quotes.quote: Success is not a function of the size of your title but the richness of your contribution
en_quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

en_quotes.quote: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be
en_quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

en_quotes.quote: The secret to success is to be yourself
en_quotes.author: S. Sreesanth

en_quotes.quote: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it
en_quotes.author: Sam Ewing

en_quotes.quote: Flaming enthusiasm, backed up by horse sense and persistence, is the quality that most frequently makes for success
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Perseverance - a lowly virtue whereby mediocrity achieves an inglorious success
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Success is not two cars or a swimming pool. It's the approval of your peers
en_quotes.author: Peter Finch

en_quotes.quote: The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life - mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical
en_quotes.author: Julius Erving

en_quotes.quote: Success is not only one thing. It's not only having a nice house in Beverly Hills and driving a nice Mercedes
en_quotes.author: Malik Bendjelloul

en_quotes.quote: The road to success is always under construction... there are lots of pot holes but no traffic jams
en_quotes.author: Dan Pena

en_quotes.quote: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack
en_quotes.author: Sun Tzu

en_quotes.quote: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate
en_quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

en_quotes.quote: Encouragement of higher education for our youth is critical to the success of our collective future
en_quotes.author: Charles B. Rangel

en_quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: True success, true happiness lies in freedom and fulfillment
en_quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

en_quotes.quote: The success of a production depends on the attention paid to detail
en_quotes.author: David O. Selznick

en_quotes.quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace
en_quotes.author: Mike Ditka

en_quotes.quote: Obedience brings success; exact obedience brings miracles
en_quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: A great social success is a pretty girl who plays her cards as carefully as if she were plain
en_quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: To have success in your professional life is not so hard. To succeed as a man is more difficult
en_quotes.author: Yann Arthus-Bertrand

en_quotes.quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up
en_quotes.author: Wilma Mankiller

en_quotes.quote: There's no such thing as failure - just waiting for success
en_quotes.author: John Osborne

en_quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. There's no point in being a damn fool about it
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: Success is the child of drudgery and perseverance. It cannot be coaxed or bribed; pay the price and it is yours
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: I hope people remember me as a good and decent man. And if they do, then that's success
en_quotes.author: Tim Cook

en_quotes.quote: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Success is all about persistence and doing the right thing for the long term
en_quotes.author: Bruce Rauner

en_quotes.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with; you're just gonna end up lonely
en_quotes.author: Selena Gomez

en_quotes.quote: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: I think I was born with the drive for success because I have a certain gene
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: I worked half my life to be an overnight success, and still it took me by surprise
en_quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

en_quotes.quote: Success is not just making money. Success is happiness. Success is fulfillment; it's the ability to give
en_quotes.author: Adam Neumann

en_quotes.quote: Enjoy failure and learn from it. You can never learn from success
en_quotes.author: James Dyson

en_quotes.quote: Flags are about proclaiming power... that visibility is key to our success and to our justice
en_quotes.author: Gilbert Baker

en_quotes.quote: I find success to be being able to do what you love and provide for your family by doing what you love
en_quotes.author: Jordan Fisher

en_quotes.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Our daily decisions and habits have a huge impact upon both our levels of happiness and success
en_quotes.author: Shawn Achor

en_quotes.quote: Finding good partners is the key to success in anything: in business, in marriage and, especially, in investing
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: The keys to brand success are self-definition, transparency, authenticity and accountability
en_quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

en_quotes.quote: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs
en_quotes.author: Woody Hayes

en_quotes.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit
en_quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

en_quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success
en_quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

en_quotes.quote: The very first step towards success in any occupation is to become interested in it
en_quotes.author: William Osler

en_quotes.quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success
en_quotes.author: Bo Bennett

en_quotes.quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear
en_quotes.author: Brian Tracy

en_quotes.quote: They talk about the failure of socialism but where is the success of capitalism in Africa, Asia and Latin America?
en_quotes.author: Fidel Castro

en_quotes.quote: On or off the field, practice and teamwork are the key to success
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Jenkins

en_quotes.quote: It is not the going out of port, but the coming in, that determines the success of a voyage
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Be careful of success; it has a dark side
en_quotes.author: Robert Redford

en_quotes.quote: Ambition is the path to success, persistence is the vehicle you arrive in
en_quotes.author: William Eardley IV

en_quotes.quote: Happiness must happen, and the same holds for success: you have to let it happen by not caring about it
en_quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

en_quotes.quote: The key to success is to get out into the store and listen to what the associates have to say
en_quotes.author: Sam Walton

en_quotes.quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you do, you'll be successful
en_quotes.author: Tyga

en_quotes.quote: To burn always with this hard, gem-like flame, to maintain this ecstasy, is success in life
en_quotes.author: Walter Pater

en_quotes.quote: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: Success to me is only two things: happiness and stability
en_quotes.author: Kehlani

en_quotes.quote: Sustainability is the key to our survival on this planet and will also determine success on all levels
en_quotes.author: Shari Arison

en_quotes.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success
en_quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

en_quotes.quote: Once you have a lot of success, you become a target in many ways
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

en_quotes.quote: The seeds of success in every nation on Earth are best planted in women and children
en_quotes.author: Joyce Banda

en_quotes.quote: That man is a success who has lived well, laughed often and loved much
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way
en_quotes.author: Vera Wang

en_quotes.quote: We must walk consciously only part way toward our goal, and then leap in the dark to our success
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: Honesty is the cornerstone of all success, without which confidence and ability to perform shall cease to exist
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

en_quotes.quote: There's no abiding success without commitment
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: The secret of success is to be ready when your opportunity comes
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success
en_quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: If you have people invested emotionally in the success of their team, that usually translates to strong attendance
en_quotes.author: Kelley O'Hara

en_quotes.quote: There's no one particular road that will lead you to success. I think everybody will find it differently
en_quotes.author: Marina and the Diamonds

en_quotes.quote: Before everything else, getting ready is the secret of success
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: Survival was my only hope, success my only revenge
en_quotes.author: Patricia Cornwell

en_quotes.quote: Success in golf depends less on strength of body than upon strength of mind and character
en_quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

en_quotes.quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal. My strength lies solely in my tenacity
en_quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

en_quotes.quote: Whatever you do to gain success, you have to hang in there and hope good things happen. Always think positive
en_quotes.author: Don Rickles

en_quotes.quote: It's how you deal with failure that determines how you achieve success
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

en_quotes.quote: Success comes when people act together; failure tends to happen alone
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Success breeds complacency. Complacency breeds failure. Only the paranoid survive
en_quotes.author: Andy Grove

en_quotes.quote: I always say be humble but be firm. Humility and openness are the key to success without compromising your beliefs
en_quotes.author: George Hickenlooper

en_quotes.quote: She's the kind of girl who climbed the ladder of success wrong by wrong
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: Success is about persistence. You can only afford to be persistent in something you deeply enjoy
en_quotes.author: Cenk Uygur

en_quotes.quote: Each success only buys an admission ticket to a more difficult problem
en_quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

en_quotes.quote: The first principle of success is desire - knowing what you want. Desire is the planting of your seed
en_quotes.author: Robert Collier

en_quotes.quote: I wonder how many times people give up just before a breakthrough - when they are on the very brink of success
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Success in foreign policy, as in carpentry, requires the right tools for the job
en_quotes.author: Richard N. Haass

en_quotes.quote: Ask yourself the secret of your success. Listen to your answer, and practice it
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Success isn't permanent and failure isn't fatal
en_quotes.author: Mike Ditka

en_quotes.quote: Any businessman will tell you that transportation is fundamental to success
en_quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

en_quotes.quote: It takes two to make a marriage a success and only one to make it a failure
en_quotes.author: Herbert Samuel

en_quotes.quote: My adoption journey fully fuels my inspiration, my drive, what my vision of success is
en_quotes.author: Jordan Fisher

en_quotes.quote: I hate the idea of success robbing you of your private life
en_quotes.author: Paul McCartney

en_quotes.quote: Failure is not our only punishment for laziness; there is also the success of others
en_quotes.author: Jules Renard

en_quotes.quote: The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen
en_quotes.author: Sarah Brown

en_quotes.quote: I feel true success comes from being able to work and the love for it
en_quotes.author: Kiana Tom

en_quotes.quote: Success is dependent on effort
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Hollywood has a way of making everything seem like an overnight success
en_quotes.author: Kevin Hart

en_quotes.quote: The power of fortune is confessed only by the miserable, for the happy impute all their success to prudence or merit
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: I always say that what's between you and your success is yourself
en_quotes.author: Eiza Gonzalez

en_quotes.quote: Success is more a function of consistent common sense than it is of genius
en_quotes.author: An Wang

en_quotes.quote: Part of the secret of a success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy
en_quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

en_quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is liking what you get
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal
en_quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

en_quotes.quote: The superior man makes the difficulty to be overcome his first interest; success only comes later
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: I've had a lot of success; I've had failures, so I learn from the failure
en_quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

en_quotes.quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: I'm an addict, I'm addicted to success. Thankfully, there's no rehab for success
en_quotes.author: Lil Wayne

en_quotes.quote: Your success depends mainly upon what you think of yourself and whether you believe in yourself
en_quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

en_quotes.quote: Obedience is the mother of success and is wedded to safety
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: The best success, for me, is not one trophy. It's not harmony. It's when players improve and grow
en_quotes.author: Unai Emery

en_quotes.quote: My formula for success is rise early, work late, and strike oil
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business and your business in your heart
en_quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

en_quotes.quote: The preparation is what allows the success to happen naturally
en_quotes.author: Jake Arrieta

en_quotes.quote: Raising children is an uncertain thing; success is reached only after a life of battle and worry
en_quotes.author: Democritus

en_quotes.quote: Indomitable perseverance in a business, properly understood, always ensures ultimate success
en_quotes.author: Cyrus McCormick

en_quotes.quote: I don't believe in the transformation myth, where if you have more success, life changes for you
en_quotes.author: Ben Mendelsohn

en_quotes.quote: I have only one understanding of development and of making success, and that's by going step by step
en_quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

en_quotes.quote: One man cannot practice many arts with success
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning
en_quotes.author: Billie Jean King

en_quotes.quote: Success is the best revenge. I always feel women should answer back either with their sarcasm or success
en_quotes.author: Kangana Ranaut

en_quotes.quote: I owe my success to all my teammates. It is the result of the team work
en_quotes.author: Sandeep Singh

en_quotes.quote: The secret of success is sincerity
en_quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

en_quotes.quote: There is simply no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success
en_quotes.author: Heather Bresch

en_quotes.quote: If you want success, be unique
en_quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

en_quotes.quote: Success is sweet and sweeter if long delayed and gotten through many struggles and defeats
en_quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

en_quotes.quote: However things may seem, no evil thing is success and no good thing is failure
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: Fortune befriends the bold
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: It takes 20 years to make an overnight success
en_quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

en_quotes.quote: Success is dependent upon the glands - sweat glands
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Success must never be measured by how much money you have
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Adjusting to the passage of time, I think, is a key to success and to life: just being able to roll with the punches
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: I think that success is having fun
en_quotes.author: Bruno Mars

en_quotes.quote: The measure of success is happiness and peace of mind
en_quotes.author: Bobby Davro

en_quotes.quote: The single most important key to success is to be a good listener
en_quotes.author: Kelly Wearstler

en_quotes.quote: I've learned that mistakes can often be as good a teacher as success
en_quotes.author: Jack Welch

en_quotes.quote: Success is the child of audacity
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: The Lord gave us two ends - one to sit on and the other to think with. Success depends on which one we use the most
en_quotes.author: Ann Landers

en_quotes.quote: Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success
en_quotes.author: Martha Stewart

en_quotes.quote: Winning is different based on your perspective, just like success is different based on your perspective
en_quotes.author: CM Punk

en_quotes.quote: I can give you a six-word formula for success: Think things through - then follow through
en_quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

en_quotes.quote: There's really no secret to success. You make your own success
en_quotes.author: Alex Morgan

en_quotes.quote: You never achieve success unless you like what you are doing
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Success doesn't find you when you're alone in your house
en_quotes.author: Katya Zamolodchikova

en_quotes.quote: No matter how much success you're having, you can't continue working together if you can't communicate
en_quotes.author: Matt Cameron

en_quotes.quote: Every failure is a step to success
en_quotes.author: William Whewell

en_quotes.quote: The only yardstick for success our society has is being a champion. No one remembers anything else
en_quotes.author: John Madden

en_quotes.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Success is always temporary. When all is said and one, the only thing you'll have left is your character
en_quotes.author: Vince Gill

en_quotes.quote: Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self
en_quotes.author: Ralph Marston

en_quotes.quote: The best revenge in the world is success
en_quotes.author: Suge Knight

en_quotes.quote: Success follows those adept at preserving the substance of the past by clothing it in the forms of the future
en_quotes.author: Dee Hock

en_quotes.quote: Success has always been easy to measure. It is the distance between one's origins and one's final achievement
en_quotes.author: Michael Korda

en_quotes.quote: We're Americans. We celebrate success. We just don't want the game to be rigged
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

en_quotes.quote: I honestly think it is better to be a failure at something you love than to be a success at something you hate
en_quotes.author: George Burns

en_quotes.quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Only stupid people are changed by success
en_quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

en_quotes.quote: While formal schooling is an important advantage, it is not a guarantee of success nor is its absence a fatal handicap
en_quotes.author: Ray Kroc

en_quotes.quote: I planned my success. I knew it was going to happen
en_quotes.author: Erykah Badu

en_quotes.quote: From success you get a lot of things, but not that great inside thing that love brings you
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: I've had a good life, full of more success and happiness than I ever expected
en_quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

en_quotes.quote: Success is to improve, grow up, build one team with personality, and then I want to win
en_quotes.author: Unai Emery

en_quotes.quote: Rockefeller once explained the secret of success. 'Get up early, work late - and strike oil.'
en_quotes.author: Joey Adams

en_quotes.quote: Happy people are ignoramuses and glory is nothing else but success, and to achieve it one only has to be cunning
en_quotes.author: Mikhail Lermontov

en_quotes.quote: Success to me is having ten honeydew melons and eating only the top half of each slice
en_quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

en_quotes.quote: The danger of success is that it makes us forget the world's dreadful injustice
en_quotes.author: Jules Renard

en_quotes.quote: I go out there to win. People don't care if you die in this business. The only way I get back is with success
en_quotes.author: Michael Bay

en_quotes.quote: The people that I surround myself with now and my family, they are the key to my success
en_quotes.author: Pablo Sandoval

en_quotes.quote: Everyone I know who is having success in film right now is there because of persistence
en_quotes.author: Jay Duplass

en_quotes.quote: People fall forward to success
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

en_quotes.quote: All men's gains are the fruit of venturing
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: The secret of my success is a two word answer: Know people
en_quotes.author: Harvey S. Firestone

en_quotes.quote: Success is not forever and failure isn't fatal
en_quotes.author: Don Shula

en_quotes.quote: The secrets of success are a good wife and a steady job. My wife told me
en_quotes.author: Howard Nemerov

en_quotes.quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Success doesn't demand a price. Every step forward pays a dividend
en_quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: A person with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success
en_quotes.author: Bo Bennett

en_quotes.quote: There's no success story. Everybody's got a ghetto story. You always want to make it bigger than what it is
en_quotes.author: Bernie Mac

en_quotes.quote: Always remember that striving and struggle precede success, even in the dictionary
en_quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

en_quotes.quote: I've always believed that one woman's success can only help another woman's success
en_quotes.author: Gloria Vanderbilt

en_quotes.quote: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Nothing succeeds like success. Get a little success, and then just get a little more
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Success has always been a great liar
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Perseverance is also key to success in any endeavor, but without perseverance in combat, there can be no victory
en_quotes.author: Jocko Willink

en_quotes.quote: The ambition and focus that propel you to success can also be your downfall
en_quotes.author: Judy Smith

en_quotes.quote: Anything that won't sell, I don't want to invent. Its sale is proof of utility, and utility is success
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Whether you're a founder, a leader, or an individual contributor, building a strong team is critical to your success
en_quotes.author: Julia Hartz

en_quotes.quote: Success is full of promise till one gets it, and then it seems like a nest from which the bird has flown
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: The most successful men in the end are those whose success is the result of steady accretion
en_quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

en_quotes.quote: I believe any success in life is made by going into an area with a blind, furious optimism
en_quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

en_quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work. There is no such thing as an overnight success or easy money
en_quotes.author: Henry Sy

en_quotes.quote: For true success ask yourself these four questions: Why? Why not? Why not me? Why not now?
en_quotes.author: James Allen

en_quotes.quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction
en_quotes.author: Al Bernstein

en_quotes.quote: The relationships we have with people are extremely important to success on and off the job
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: There is no substitute for victory
en_quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

en_quotes.quote: I think you can have 10,000 explanations for failure, but no good explanation for success
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: Whosoever desires constant success must change his conduct with the times
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: If you have no critics you'll likely have no success
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Canada's extraordinary success is that we have bound together a vast country with a set of shared ideas and beliefs
en_quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: Do something you really like, and hopefully it pays the rent. As far as I'm concerned, that's success
en_quotes.author: Tom Petty

en_quotes.quote: I was obliged to be industrious. Whoever is equally industrious will succeed equally well
en_quotes.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

en_quotes.quote: I think baking is very rewarding, and if you follow a good recipe, you will get success
en_quotes.author: Mary Berry

en_quotes.quote: Academic success depends on research and publications
en_quotes.author: Philip Zimbardo

en_quotes.quote: Applause waits on success
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Success produces confidence; confidence relaxes industry, and negligence ruins the reputation which accuracy had raised
en_quotes.author: Ben Jonson

en_quotes.quote: Winning and losing isn't what's important. The attempt at success and getting to your best self is what matters
en_quotes.author: Christen Press

en_quotes.quote: Hope... is the companion of power, and the mother of success; for who so hopes has within him the gift of miracles
en_quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

en_quotes.quote: Success demands singleness of purpose
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: We have to keep calm and stick together; that's the key to success
en_quotes.author: Sergio Ramos

en_quotes.quote: How one handles success or failure is determined by their early childhood
en_quotes.author: Harold Ramis

en_quotes.quote: I find my greatest pleasure, and so my reward, in the work that precedes what the world calls success
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Earn your success based on service to others, not at the expense of others
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: You do not pay the price of success, you enjoy the price of success
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: True success has more components than one sentence or idea can contain
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: We should measure welfare's success by how many people leave welfare, not by how many are added
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years
en_quotes.author: Robert Browning

en_quotes.quote: People seldom see the halting and painful steps by which the most insignificant success is achieved
en_quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

en_quotes.quote: Within the hearts men, loyalty and consideration are esteemed greater than success
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: You cannot underestimate the value of luck in success in life. And I've really learned to appreciate that
en_quotes.author: Azim Premji

en_quotes.quote: I always believe that the elders in my family are the reason for my success
en_quotes.author: R. Madhavan

en_quotes.quote: Success is a process, a quality of mind and way of being, an outgoing affirmation of life
en_quotes.author: Alex Noble

en_quotes.quote: No self-respecting woman should wish or work for the success of a party who ignores her sex
en_quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

en_quotes.quote: My measure of success is whether I'm fulfilling my mission
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful
en_quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

en_quotes.quote: My fears are never about failure - it's about extreme success
en_quotes.author: Lil Dicky

en_quotes.quote: Every step, every bit of success, it's gotta be earned
en_quotes.author: Myles Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Success comes in waves
en_quotes.author: Guy Pearce

en_quotes.quote: If you have talent, then success will come to you
en_quotes.author: Kartik Aaryan

en_quotes.quote: Scars are the price you pay for success
en_quotes.author: Melvin Van Peebles

en_quotes.quote: To be prepared is half the victory
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: Success is only meaningful and enjoyable if it feels like your own
en_quotes.author: Michelle Obama

en_quotes.quote: I try not to be influenced by success or popularity
en_quotes.author: Suga

en_quotes.quote: He has achieved success who has worked well, laughed often, and loved much
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: To me, success is choice and opportunity
en_quotes.author: Harrison Ford

en_quotes.quote: Success soon palls. The joyous time is when the breeze first strikes your sails, and the waters rustle under your bows
en_quotes.author: Charles Buxton

en_quotes.quote: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents
en_quotes.author: Salvador Dali

en_quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: Success is attaining your dream while helping others to benefit from that dream materializing
en_quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

en_quotes.quote: Everyone is looking for the hack, the secret to success without hard work
en_quotes.author: Sam Altman

en_quotes.quote: The secret to success is to offend the greatest number of people
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: In the United States, I am a great success, but I am not a celebrity
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals
en_quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out
en_quotes.author: Robert Collier

en_quotes.quote: One of the rewards of success is freedom, the ability to do whatever you like
en_quotes.author: Sting

en_quotes.quote: Success is counted sweetest by those who never succeed
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Failure is a part of success
en_quotes.author: Hank Aaron

en_quotes.quote: Success, to me, is just doing things that I'm really proud of
en_quotes.author: Dua Lipa

en_quotes.quote: Life is bigger than cinema. Cinema is just a part of life, so I never take success or failure seriously
en_quotes.author: Pawan Kalyan

en_quotes.quote: Self-care equals success. You're going to be more successful if you take care of yourself and you're healthy
en_quotes.author: Beth Behrs

en_quotes.quote: When you delegate work to the member of the team, your job is to clearly frame success and describe the objectives
en_quotes.author: Steven Sinofsky

en_quotes.quote: Modesty should be typical of the success of a champion
en_quotes.author: Major Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Don't confuse fame with success. Madonna is one; Helen Keller is the other
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: Success in training the boy depends largely on the Scoutmaster's own personal example
en_quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

en_quotes.quote: Men judge us by the success of our efforts. God looks at the efforts themselves
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

en_quotes.quote: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: In this great country, we celebrate success. We don't want to penalize those who have done well
en_quotes.author: Kamala Harris

en_quotes.quote: Success is never final, but failure can be
en_quotes.author: Bill Parcells

en_quotes.quote: Elegance is not a dispensable luxury but a factor that decides between success and failure
en_quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

en_quotes.quote: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall
en_quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

en_quotes.quote: The worst tragedy that could have befallen me was my success. I knew right away that I was through - cast out
en_quotes.author: Jonas Salk

en_quotes.quote: A manager is a guide. He takes a group of people and says, 'With you I can make us a success; I can show you the way.'
en_quotes.author: Arsene Wenger

en_quotes.quote: Success is what you do with your ability. It's how you use your talent
en_quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success
en_quotes.author: Irving Berlin

en_quotes.quote: The only question to ask yourself is, how much are you willing to sacrifice to achieve this success?
en_quotes.author: Larry Flynt

en_quotes.quote: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded
en_quotes.author: Bessie Anderson Stanley

en_quotes.quote: You'll never convince me there is a hopeless situation or there is any finality in any success or any failure
en_quotes.author: Carlos Ghosn

en_quotes.quote: I think success shows a person's true colors
en_quotes.author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job, and not be paid for it
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Success is getting and achieving what you want. Happiness is wanting and being content with what you get
en_quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

en_quotes.quote: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: My University of Management will create managers who will float in happiness, success and fulfillment
en_quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

en_quotes.quote: I look at where I'm at today and realize that most of my success is owed to the mentors that was in my life
en_quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

en_quotes.quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: Real success is not on the stage, but off the stage as a human being, and how you get along with your fellow man
en_quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Nobody travels on the road to success without a puncture or two
en_quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

en_quotes.quote: When I wrap my hands, I do it for my family. I owe my courage to them and also my success. That's why I fight
en_quotes.author: Gennady Golovkin

en_quotes.quote: For me, I always want success
en_quotes.author: Mohamed Salah

en_quotes.quote: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success
en_quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

en_quotes.quote: You've achieved success in your field when you don't know whether what you're doing is work or play
en_quotes.author: Warren Beatty

en_quotes.quote: Some say I'm an overnight success. Well, that was a very long night that lasted about 10 years
en_quotes.author: Lisa Morton

en_quotes.quote: I felt most proud on the success of the Apollo mission
en_quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Failure is not an option. Everyone has to succeed
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Everything I have, my career, my success, my family, I owe to America
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Success is best when it's shared
en_quotes.author: Howard Schultz

en_quotes.quote: It goes without saying that it's hard to attain a certain level of success
en_quotes.author: T.I.

en_quotes.quote: When you win, nothing hurts
en_quotes.author: Joe Namath

en_quotes.quote: The secret of my success is my hairspray
en_quotes.author: Richard Gere

en_quotes.quote: My success is not due to any personal superiority over other people
en_quotes.author: John Philip Sousa

en_quotes.quote: Success isn't everything but it makes a man stand straight
en_quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

en_quotes.quote: Most of us are afraid of our success, that we will actually be great
en_quotes.author: Laurence Fishburne

en_quotes.quote: We all know that Social Security is one of this country's greatest success stories in the 20th century
en_quotes.author: Mitch McConnell

en_quotes.quote: Steroids do not guarantee you're going to have success. I think a lot of people think that they will, but they don't
en_quotes.author: Tony Gwynn

en_quotes.quote: Just do what you believe in, and success will follow
en_quotes.author: Karisma Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: Today's tactical victory does not guarantee tomorrow's strategic success
en_quotes.author: Peter Pace

en_quotes.quote: It's cool to have critical success because it's always nice for your peers to say, 'Good job.' But who cares about them?
en_quotes.author: Zac Hanson

en_quotes.quote: Success for an athlete follows many years of hard work and dedication
en_quotes.author: Michael Diamond

en_quotes.quote: Success is the one unpardonable sin against our fellows
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: We fall forward to succeed
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

en_quotes.quote: One fails forward toward success
en_quotes.author: Charles Kettering

en_quotes.quote: Success is not a stop sign
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Nothing recedes like success
en_quotes.author: Walter Winchell

en_quotes.quote: I've had great success being a total idiot
en_quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

en_quotes.quote: The victor belongs to the spoils
en_quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: I couldn't wait for success, so I went ahead without it
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Winters

en_quotes.quote: We create success or failure on the course primarily by our thoughts
en_quotes.author: Gary Player

en_quotes.quote: You can't always expect to work with a director who guarantees success
en_quotes.author: Dhanush

en_quotes.quote: The man who has done his level best... is a success, even though the world may write him down a failure
en_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: Having a hit is nice, having some success, but when you move popular culture, that's a high
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

en_quotes.quote: Nothing succeeds like success
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

en_quotes.quote: Success is the space one occupies in the newspaper. Success is one day's insolence
en_quotes.author: Elias Canetti

en_quotes.quote: In this world it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination
en_quotes.author: Ben Sweetland

en_quotes.quote: Anybody that's intimidated by my success probably isn't the right person for me
en_quotes.author: Alexa Hirschfeld

en_quotes.quote: I've learned it's always better to have a small percentage of a big success, than a hundred percent of nothing
en_quotes.author: Art Linkletter

en_quotes.quote: If you have a successful run, everything comes to you. Nothing succeeds like success
en_quotes.author: John Barry

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I worry about being a success in a mediocre world
en_quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

en_quotes.quote: There is no success without hardship
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Much effort, much prosperity
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: They succeed, because they think they can
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: Winning isn’t everything, but it sure beats anything that comes in second
en_quotes.author: Bear Bryant

en_quotes.quote: Success breeds success
en_quotes.author: Mia Hamm

en_quotes.quote: To be successful you have to be lucky, or a little mad, or very talented, or find yourself in a rapid growth field
en_quotes.author: Edward de Bono

en_quotes.quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go
en_quotes.author: William Feather

en_quotes.quote: In a balanced organization, working towards a common objective, there is success
en_quotes.author: Arthur Helps

en_quotes.quote: The one thing that I know is that you win with good people
en_quotes.author: Don Shula

en_quotes.quote: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?
en_quotes.author: Jeff Rich

en_quotes.quote: It's the steady, quiet, plodding ones who win in the lifelong race
en_quotes.author: Robert W. Service

en_quotes.quote: Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure
en_quotes.author: Earl Wilson

en_quotes.quote: It's our nature: Human beings like success but they hate successful people
en_quotes.author: Carrot Top

en_quotes.quote: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves
en_quotes.author: Larry King

en_quotes.quote: If you want to achieve things in life, you've just got to do them, and if you're talented and smart, you'll succeed
en_quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

en_quotes.quote: I don't think about financial success as the measurement of my success
en_quotes.author: Christie Hefner

en_quotes.quote: Success is not judged by just success in a particular championship
en_quotes.author: Lin Dan

en_quotes.quote: The real secret of success is enthusiasm
en_quotes.author: Walter Chrysler

en_quotes.quote: The success and the failure are not my concern, but His
en_quotes.author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

en_quotes.quote: Success is freedom - scripts coming your way and getting to choose the stories you want to tell
en_quotes.author: Rosamund Pike

en_quotes.quote: But we look back now, and we realize the Great Society was not a success
en_quotes.author: Alphonso Jackson

en_quotes.quote: The people in New York want to achieve something; the people in L.A., they just want to achieve success
en_quotes.author: Zach Galligan

en_quotes.quote: To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past
en_quotes.author: Charles J. Givens

en_quotes.quote: The one phrase you can use is that success has a thousand fathers, and failure is an orphan
en_quotes.author: Alan Price

en_quotes.quote: It's not enough that I should succeed - others should fail
en_quotes.author: David Merrick

en_quotes.quote: Success is that old ABC - ability, breaks, and courage
en_quotes.author: Charles Luckman
